snippet: With her fashion shows, Akuja de Garang is trying to change perceptions of South Sudan, including those of its own people, even as interethnic tension and violence persist.
abstract: Juba Journal; fashion show organizer Akuja de Garang is trying to change perceptions of South Sudan, including those of its own people, even as interethnic tension and violence persist.
lead_paragraph: With her fashion shows, Akuja de Garang is trying to change perceptions of South Sudan, including those of its own people, even as interethnic tension and violence persist.

headline.main: On Fashion Runway, South Sudan Takes Steps Toward a National Identity
